noResults.p1: Please try again. You can search in the following categories:
noResults.l1: Words contained in the name (title) of the algorithm
noResults.l2: Words contained in the description of the algorithm
noResults.l3: The name of the responsible organisation of the algorithm.

searchSuggestion.title: Go straight to an algorithm description

orgSuggestionSearch.title: Choose out of the following options:
orgSuggestionSearch.OrgGenericSearch: Algorithm descriptions that contain the term '{searchQuery}'

home-highlight-algorithm-text: Or go directly to one of these algorithms
foundResults: No algorithms were found | 1 result found | {n} results found
foundResultsOrganisations: No organisations were found | 1 result found | {n} results found
noResults: No algorithm was found for this search request.

footer.text: Note: this website is under development. Information will change often. Do you want to help?

orgPage.head: Organisation overview
orgPage.title: Organisation overview
orgPage.noAbout: This organisation has not yet supplied us with a description
orgPage.alternativeAlgorithmDescriptions: This organisation has published the following algorithm descriptions

homepageTitle: The Algorithm Register of the Dutch government

homePageText.paragraph1: On this website governmental organisations publish the algorithms that are in use.
homePageText.paragraph2: Effort is made to publish impactful algorithms. This to ensure the purpose of algorithms and to make sure people involved can examine the algorithms.

dashboard.countPerTypeTitle: Algorithms in the register per type
dashboard.totalPublishedAlgorithmDescriptions: Total number of published algorithm descriptions
dashboard.moreInfo: Click on a line for more information.
dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.legendGreen: Is affiliated and has published on the registry.
dashboard.legendYellow: Is affiliated but has not published anything yet.
dashboard.legendWhite: Is not yet affiliated with the registry.
dashboard.municipalityMapDescription: Here it is shown which municipalities in the Netherlands are affiliated and have published them on the Algorithm Register.
dashboard.provinceMapDescription: Here it is shown which provinces in the Netherlands are affiliated and have published them on the Algorithm Register.
dashboard.waterAuthoritiesMapDescription: Here it is shown which water authorities in the Netherlands are affiliated and have published them on the Algorithm Register.
dashboard.environmentalServicesMapDescription: Here it is shown which environmental services in the Netherlands are affiliated and have published them on the Algorithm Register.
dashboard.publishedAlgorithmDescription: This shows how many algorithm descriptions have been published in the Algorithm Register in the last 12 months.
dashboard.joinedOrganisationsDescription: This shows how many organizations are affiliated with Algorithm Register per month.
dashboard.brokenLinksDescription: Here it is shown per day how many references appear in published algorithm descriptions that no longer work or whose response time is too slow (more than 5 seconds). This check is under development. It is possible that working references be wrongly reported.
dashboard.publicationCategoriesDescription: This shows how many algorithm descriptions in the publication categories 'High-risk AI system', 'Impactful algorithms' and 'Other algorithms' have been published in the Algorithm Register.
dashboard.top20OrganisationsDescription: Here are shown the twenty organizations that have published the most algorithm descriptions in the Algorithm Register.
dashboard.name: Name

name.label: Name
name.description: The name used to refer to the algorithm.

organization.label: Organisation
organization.description: The full name of the organisation responsible for the algorithm use.

department.label: Department
department.description: The full name of the sub-organisation or division responsible for the algorithm use.

description_short.label: Short description
description_short.description: A brief, high-level description of the algorithm (max. 150 characters).

type.label: Algorithm type
type.description: Is the algorithm rule-based or based on machine learning? Rule-based algorithms are manually constructed by humans, usually based off of laws or regulations. Machine learning algorithms will find their own correlations based on the data given.

category.label: Domain
category.description: Keywords related to the domain in which the algorithm is deployed.

website.label: Link to publication website
website.description: The URL of the publication website of the organisation. On this page, you may find more information regarding the deployment of the algorithm at the organisation.

status.label: Status
status.description: The current implementation state of the algorithm: in development, in use, or out of service.

goal.label: Purpose
goal.description: The purpose for which the algorithm was developed and/or how the algorithm's deployment directly adds to this purpose.

impact.label: Impact
impact.description: The impact of the algorithm on civilians and companies. For example: how does this algorithm work and what are its expected consequences for civilians and companies?

proportionality.label: Proportionality
proportionality.description: A consideration of pros and cons regarding the deployment of the algorithm and why this is reasonably justified.

decision_making_process.label: Decision making process
decision_making_process.description: The name of the organisational process(es) within the organisation in which the algorithm is deployed.

documentation.label: Link to project website
documentation.description: The URL of the project website of the organisation. On this page, you may find more information regarding the project where the algorithm is deployed.

description.label: Long description
description.description: An extensive description of the algorithm (500-10000 characters).

application_url.label: Link to developer
application_url.description: The URL of the application website of the developer. On this page, you may find more general information regarding the algorithm and its developer.

publiccode.label: Link to code base
publiccode.description: The URL of the code base of the developer. On this page, you may find more specific information regarding the algorithm's code itself.

mprd.label: Usage of base registries
mprd.description: Does the algorithm directly use any data of the national base registries? More information is available at https://www.nldigitalgovernment.nl/

source_data.label: Data sources
source_data.description: An overview of data sources that are currently being used by the algorithm and/or were initially being used to create the algorithm.

methods_and_models.label: Methods and models
methods_and_models.description: Standard methodology or models that are being used by the algorithm.

monitoring.label: Monitoring
monitoring.description: An overview of how the deployment of the algorithm is being monitored.

human_intervention.label: Human intervention
human_intervention.description: A description of how the output of the alghorithm is reviewed and may be edited by humans.

risks.label: Risks
risks.description: An overview of the expected risks related to the deployment of this algorithm.

performance_standard.label: Evaluation metrics
performance_standard.description: A description of the expected scoring of the algorithm, including its metrics.

competent_authority.label: Authorized body
competent_authority.description: The full name of the authorized body responsible for the deployment of the algorithm.

lawful_basis.label: Formal grounds
lawful_basis.description: A description of or link to the formal grounds that form the base of the deployment of this algorithm. For example: a law, a regulation or a formal decision.

iama.label: Human Rights Impact Assessment (IAMA)
iama.description: Has the algorithm been verified through a human rights impact assessment (IAMA)?

iama_description.label: IAMA Description
iama_description.description: An executive summary of the IAMA results, if any.

dpia.label: Data Protection Impact Assessment (DPIA)
dpia.description: Has the algorithm been verified through a data protection impact assessment (DPIA)?

dpia_description.label: DPIA Description
dpia_description.description: An executive summary of the DPIA results, if any.

objection_procedure.label: Objection procedure
objection_procedure.description: A description of how civilians and companies may object against an outcome of the algorithm.

standard_version.label: Scheme
standard_version.description: The registration scheme; in machine readable format.

uuid.label: UUID
uuid.description: The unique user identification (UUID) of this registration.

url.label: Link to source registration
url.description: The URL of the secondary register in which this algorithm was previously documented; in machine readable format

contact_email.label: Contact email
contact_email.description: The contact email for this registration.

area.label: Geographic area
area.description: The geopgrahical location in which the algorithm is deployed.

lang.label: Language
lang.description: The language in which this registration is documented.

revision_date.label: Revision date
revision_date.description: The revision date of this registration.

source_id.label: Source-ID
source_id.description: The unique code the owner uses for this algorithm.

provider.label: External provider
provider.description: If applicable, the external provider of the algorithm.

process_index_url.label: Link to Processing Index
process_index_url.description: The link to the GDPR-processing in a public register of the algorithm.

tags.label: Tags
tags.description: Keywords describing the algorithm to improve search engine results in this register.

name.label: Name
name.description: The name used to refer to the algorithm.

organization.label: Organisation
organization.description: The full name of the organisation using the algorithm.

description_short.label: Short description
description_short.description: A brief description of the algorithm

type.label: Self-learning
type.description: Is it algorithm or self-learning? In a non-self-learning algorithm, the human specifies the rules for the computer to follow. If it's a self-learning algorithm, the machine learns about the patterns in the data.

category.label: Theme
category.description: Keywords related to the domain in which the algorithm is deployed.

website.label: Link to publication website
website.description: The URL of the publication website of the organisation. On this page, you may find more information regarding the deployment of the algorithm at the organisation.

status.label: Status
status.description: The current implementation state of the algorithm: in development, in use, or out of service.

begin_date.label: Begin date
begin_date.description: Month and year in which the algorithm was launched.

end_date.label: End date
end_date.description: Month in which the algorithm was retired.

goal.label: Goal and impact
goal.description: The purpose for which the algorithm was developed and the impact it has on civilians and companies.

proportionality.label: Considerations
proportionality.description: A consideration of pros and cons regarding the deployment of the algorithm and why this is reasonably justified.

provider.label: External provider
provider.description: If applicable, the external provider of the algorithm.

lawful_basis.label: Legal basis
lawful_basis.description: A description of the legal basis for the process in which the algorithm is used.

lawful_basis_link.label: Link to legal basis
lawful_basis_link.description: A link to the legal basis for the process in which the algorithm is used.

impacttoetsen.label: Impact assessments
impacttoetsen.description: The impact assessments that were used, such as the Data Protection Impact Assesment (DPIA) or Impact Assessment Mensenrechten en Algoritmes (IAMA)?

iama_description.label: Link to impact assessment
iama_description.description: Link to the results of a conducted impact assessment such as a DPIA or IAMA.

url.label: Link to source registration
url.description: The URL of the secondary register in which this algorithm was previously documented; in machine readable format

lang.label: Language
lang.description: The language in which this registration is documented.

standard_version.label: Publication Standard
standard_version.description: The registration scheme; in machine readable format.

uuid.label: National-ID
uuid.description: The unique user identification (UUID) of this registration.

source_id.label: Source-ID
source_id.description: The unique code the owner uses for this algorithm.

tags.label: Tags
tags.description: Keywords describing the algorithm to improve search engine results in this register.

source_data.label: Data
source_data.description: An overview of data that are used by the algorithm and/or were initially being used to create the algorithm.

source_data_link.label: Link to data sources
source_data_link.description: Links to additional information about the used data sources.

methods_and_models.label: Technical design
methods_and_models.description: Explanation of how the algorithm works.

publiccode.label: Link to code base
publiccode.description: The URL of the code base of the developer. On this page, you may find more specific information regarding the algorithm's code itself.

human_intervention.label: Human intervention
human_intervention.description: A description of how the output of the algorithm is used by humans and how they can be reviewed and edited.

risks.label: Risk management
risks.description: An overview of how risks are dealt with.

publication_category.label: Publication category
publication_category.description: To determine which algorithms should be published, a distinction is made between impactful and other algorithms. The AI ​​act also defines 'High-risk AI systems'.

impacttoetsen_grouping.label: Impact assessment
impacttoetsen_grouping.description: Name of the conducted impact assessment, such as a DPIA or IAMA, and the possibility to include a link of the impact assesment.

impacttoetsen.label: Elaboration on impact assessments
impacttoetsen.description: Elaboration on why certain impact assessment were not performed.

process_index_url.label: Link to Processing Index
process_index_url.description: Link to a public share of the processing index relevant to the algorithm. There you will find more information on the processing.
